column4: I opened the file in an editor, and in the starting it says something about "make"
perhaps I need to make the file? I am new to linux and don't really know what it means
what is it your trying to do ?
I downloaded the package called grub-disk and it says it contains an image file for a rescue diskette
The file is .diff
is there a README file?
I don't know how to use it
Not really
It's just a .diff file
an image or something, I figure
thats a patch kishu
this is the description of the package: This package contains a GRUB rescue disk. It consists of a bootable
1.44 floppy image you can use to grab a rescue disk or be run in an
i386 emulator, like Bochs.
oh dunno then sorry
id imagine there should have been somesort of readme where you got it from to tell you how to run it
it's from an official ubuntu server, http://packages.ubuntu.com/hoary/admin/grub-disk
grub_0.95+cvs20040624.orig.tar.gz is wqhat you need i think
http://packages.debian.org/unstable/admin/grub-disk
I saw that one, but it's 3,5 MB, how can I get that on a floppy disk... I thought the diff was some kind of image or compressed thing
im sure theres some sort of extraction to a floppy
